# Libraries

```{r}
library(rio) #import data
library(mlogit) #multilogit
```

# Import the Data

```{r}
fulldata <- import("fulldata.csv")
```

# Multinomial Log

Please note: we are working on the data structure, but this is the basic idea of code for multinomial logistic regression. This analysis page will be updated when the survey is finalized. 

```{r}
##restructure to specific format
longdata <- mlogit.data(fulldata, 
                       choice = "onlinemotivation", shape = "wide")

##run the log!
model <- mlogit(onlinemotivation ~ 1 | K10_distress,
               data = longdata, reflevel = "NoMotivation")
summary(model)
```
